issue.title: google.com

labels.name: A: Cannot reproduce
labels.description: Filters devs cannot reproduce this issue

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

labels.name: A: Waiting for data
labels.description: Waiting for more information from the user

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [http://google.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fgoogle.com) ### Comment > Google ads appear to be un-blocked again….any help to fix this? Username: `@ar.unm` ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/dc1lpadekoowswoc4cc48c0gcko8kksk3v92hc8fao.png?nc=1)

filters: `https://filters.adtidy.org/dns/filter_1_ios.txt` Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base,
AdGuard Mobile Ads

Privacy:
AdGuard Tracking Protection

comment.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.google.com/search?q=nvidia+shield+pro&rlz=1C1VDKB_enUS974US974&oq=nvidia+shield+p&gs_lcrp=EgZjaHJvbWUqEAgAEAAYgwEY4wIYsQMYgAQyEAgAEAAYgwEY4wIYsQMYgAQyEAgBEC4YgwEYsQMYgAQY5QQyBggCEEUYQDIGCAMQRRg5MhAIBBAuGIMBGLEDGIAEGOUEMgYIBRBFGDwyBggGEEUYPDIGCAcQRRg8qAIAsAIB&sourceid=chrome&ie=UTF-8](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.google.com%2Fsearch%3Fq%3Dnvidia%2Bshield%2Bpro%26rlz%3D1C1VDKB_enUS974US974%26oq%3Dnvidia%2Bshield%2Bp%26gs_lcrp%3DEgZjaHJvbWUqEAgAEAAYgwEY4wIYsQMYgAQyEAgAEAAYgwEY4wIYsQMYgAQyEAgBEC4YgwEYsQMYgAQY5QQyBggCEEUYQDIGCAMQRRg5MhAIBBAuGIMBGLEDGIAEGOUEMgYIBRBFGDwyBggGEEUYPDIGCAcQRRg8qAIAsAIB%26sourceid%3Dchrome%26ie%3DUTF-8) ### Comment > I have to go and disable the whole plug-in to be able to click on the link. Looks like the pop-up blocker blocks a new tab from being created even with the blocker set to off on the google site. After disabling the extension, everything works well/ Username: `@KeithGP` ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/48vvu8zmc204gk0o0080cs4o404s8kws6e30awjzas.jpg?nc=1)
Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/9wujuth1mog84s0s00c08wowok88o005lr71g7kf9g.jpg?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard Browser Extension v4.3.53 System version: | Windows 11 Browser: | Chrome Stealth mode: | disabled Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base
